name: Millas Memo 2
description:
Milla has grown bigger.

And her demands on memory have also increased.

Compete against Milla this time in an animated memory!

Try to beat her again, you have an infinite number of tries.

Find pairs with the same animations!

But this time Milla won't give you a chance...
Probably the heaviest memory on earth! 

The artificial intelligence remembers each pair, which is uncovered, but otherwise pursues no strategy. Do not give up!

You can play 10 sets of different animations  and hear 7 chilling electro soundtracks.

This game is dedicated to my daughter. 

A few years ago we made the first part together.

Have a look:  https://klickaffen.tv/millas-memo/
